page.title: 07CARTLEDGE HALL
page.content: CARTLEDGE HALL WAS BUILT IN 1492. DOCUMENTS GO BACK TO 1742.THERE IS A STORY THAT THE HALL IS HAUNTED BY A LADY DRESSED IN WHITE WHO IS SAID TO WALK FROM THE KITCHEN TO THE BARN EACH NIGHT.THE PRESENT OWNERS,THE TURNER FAMILY,HAVE SEEN NO EVIDENCE TO SUGGEST THIS STORY IS FACT.THE HALL WAS RESTORED TO ITS FORMER GLORY BY MR.BASIL DONCASTER.DOING MUCH OF THE SKILLED WORK THEMSELVES MEMBERS OF THE FAMILY BEGAN A CAREFUL RESTORATION,AND TODAY THE HISTORIC BUILDING STANDS GRACIOUSLY ON ITS AGES-OLD SITE.CARTLEDGE HALL IS A LISTED BUILDING.
